reviews.text: Honestly, it is one of the best Ribeye's I have had in years, and the Chimichurri is amazing.
We went to Happy Hour, and it was good. Music needs a variety, food, good wings, and empanadas were tasty. It was empty, prices were good- Margaritas $6, wings $8, empanadas 6 also.

I don‚Äôt speak any Spanish but when I tell you I love this establishment. Lets start with the drinks . Omg mon-Thurs bartender drinks are spot on ! Now the food taste like it was made with love . Presentation of every dish comes out the kitchen looking exquisite. If you‚Äôre looking for delicious food and great drinks this is the place to be !!!
Me gusto el lugar muy bonito y acogedor .. ojo ..fui a un kareoke pero solo pon√≠an m√∫sica y m√∫sica mi participaci√≥n fue muy  breve....
Great chill place for a Friday very loud music but enjoyable music love the atmosphere love the people wouldn't knock em till ya try em
I went to Generations for happy hour. No complaints! The food was amazing. The hookah was made with love. & the drinks were strong.
My co workers and I work across the street. The vibe was great and the staff was super friendly. I don't speak Spanish but I still danced in my seat. The food was great. Definitely coming back.

We had a good time after work.  We came for drinks and wings. The beef and shrimp empanadas were very tasty.  It was just us two. Maybe we came on the wrong day but had a good time anyway. The passion fruit margarita's were good, but the glasses could be a little bigger.  The mango margarita's were good too. They wings were tasty also.. you get 5 to 6 pieces of party wings. We had the sweet chili.  This is a little gem. People shouldn't sleep....it's in the cut, but right in your face also. This will be one of our regulars, but please change the glasses to something bigger, and they were $6 and $5 shots. I'm trying to be the 1st to  add a business to Yelp review for GenerationsLounge, but it's just not working out.  I recommend Generations Lounge Restaurant & Bar for after a long day at work, drink, and wings.  It's very pocket friendly.
